Today’s cash is too small to buy any new lot in most candidates without sacrificing existing positions, so I’d wait for more cash or a reallocation from a currently overextended name.
  - Watch for mean-reversion opportunities among oversold candidates (e.g., XPMAP’s RSI is low). If XPMAP begins moving higher with improving MACD, consider a measured increase in position size over time.
